name: GOD EATER 3
description: Set in a post-apocalyptic setting, itâ€™s up to your special team of God Eaters to take down god-like monsters devastating the world. With an epic story, unique characters, and all new God Arcs and Aragami, the latest evolution in ACTION is here!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit, SP1 Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 or AMD FX-8120 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 or Radeon R9 290X DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 25 GB available space
